main event: A clear shaped object was observed in the sky for four minutes in Laconia, New Hampshire.
interesting points: The observation lasted for four minutes., The object was described as being 2 inches long and moving in a straight, horizontal course., Only one object was reported during the sighting., The report suggests the object appeared gold possibly due to sunlight reflection., The event occurred on January 25, 1959, but the observation was noted to have taken place on November 25, 1957.
